description: MCP tools for cyclic peptide computational analysis using CyclicChamp backbone sampling algorithms

tools.name: analyze_pnear_stability
tools.description: Analyze P_near stability metrics with correlation plots
tools.example_prompt: Use analyze_pnear_stability to analyze @examples/data/20res_Pnear_list.txt with min_pnear=0.9 and show me the stable designs.

tools.name: analyze_peptide_sequences
tools.description: Comprehensive sequence composition and properties analysis
tools.example_prompt: Analyze peptide sequences from @examples/data/results/Pnear_values_15res.txt using analyze_peptide_sequences. Focus only on stable designs and show me amino acid composition patterns.

tools.name: generate_backbone_parameters
tools.example_prompt: Generate backbone sampling parameters for 20-residue cyclic peptides using generate_backbone_parameters with optimization enabled.

tools.name: submit_pnear_analysis
tools.description: Submit P_near analysis for background processing
tools.example_prompt: Submit a P_near analysis job for @examples/data/24res_Pnear_list.txt using submit_pnear_analysis with job_name="large_dataset_analysis".

tools.name: submit_sequence_analysis
tools.description: Submit sequence analysis for background processing
tools.example_prompt: Submit sequence analysis for large dataset using submit_sequence_analysis.

tools.name: submit_backbone_parameter_generation
tools.example_prompt: Submit backbone parameter generation for multiple sizes.

tools.name: submit_batch_pnear_analysis
tools.example_prompt: Process multiple datasets using submit_batch_pnear_analysis with files: [@examples/data/20res_Pnear_list.txt, @examples/data/24res_Pnear_list.txt]

tools.name: submit_peptide_size_parameter_sweep
tools.example_prompt: Generate backbone parameters for all peptide sizes using submit_peptide_size_parameter_sweep.

tools.name: get_job_status
tools.example_prompt: Check the status of job abc12345 using get_job_status.

tools.name: get_job_result
tools.example_prompt: Get results for completed job using get_job_result.

tools.name: get_job_log
tools.example_prompt: View logs for job using get_job_log with tail=100.

tools.name: list_jobs
tools.description: List all jobs with optional status filter
tools.example_prompt: List all running jobs using list_jobs.

tools.name: list_available_configs
tools.example_prompt: What configuration files are available? Use list_available_configs.

tools.name: get_config_contents
tools.example_prompt: Show me the contents of pnear_analysis_config.json using get_config_contents.

tools.name: get_tool_info
tools.example_prompt: What tools are available from cyclicchamp-tools MCP server? Use get_tool_info to show me all available tools and their categories.

scripts.name: pnear_analysis.py
scripts.description: Analyze P_near stability values for cyclic peptides from CyclicChamp results
parameters: --output-dir/-o: Output directory for plots and reports (optional)
--min-pnear: Minimum P_near threshold for stable designs (default: 0.9)

scripts.name: sequence_analysis.py
scripts.description: Analyze sequence composition, chirality patterns, and physicochemical properties
parameters: --stable-only: Analyze only stable designs above threshold (flag)

scripts.name: backbone_sampling_params.py
scripts.description: Generate backbone sampling parameters for CyclicChamp simulated annealing
parameters: --size/-s: Peptide size - must be 7, 15, 20, or 24 residues (required)

data_format.d_amino_acids: D prefix notation (e.g., DLEU, DPHE, DTYR)

use_cases.name: Sequence Composition Analysis

Detailed statistical report with sequence insights

use_cases.name: CyclicChamp Parameter Generation
use_cases.goal: Generate optimized backbone sampling parameters for different peptide sizes
expected_output: 6-panel parameter visualization (energy thresholds, temperatures, move parameters)

use_cases.name: Virtual Screening Pipeline
use_cases.goal: Screen multiple peptide datasets for stability patterns
expected_output: Designs with P_near > 0.9 and Energy < -40 kcal/mol
Backbone parameters for promising peptide sizes

use_cases.name: End-to-End Stability Assessment
use_cases.goal: Complete analysis workflow for peptide design validation
